Getting started

Thank you for purchasing Adventure Travel - React Native App! We hope you can take advantage of it to launch your Android/iOS project in a fast and well-structured way.

Below you will find the documentation to deploy this project, but first make sure you have a React Native CLI environment installed properly. If you do not have an environment installed yet, we recommend following the steps for React Native CLI Quickstart in the official React native documentation, where you can get information to configure environments for Android and iOS in Windows, Linux or macOS.

Once you have your environment ready, extract the project source code to your workspace. After that you can continue with the next session to start setting up the backend environment or maybe you prefer to start by migrating this project to your own brand.
